summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The AMCOPPStatusOutput structure contains the result of a Certified Output Protection Protocol (COPP) status request.

member.name: AMCOPPStatusOutput.macKDI
member.summary: Message Authentication Code (MAC) of the status data. The driver will use AES-based one-key CBC MAC (OMAC) to calculate this value.

member.name: AMCOPPStatusOutput.cbSizeData
member.summary: Size of the valid data in the COPPStatus member.

member.name: AMCOPPStatusOutput.COPPStatus
member.summary: Buffer that contains the result of the status request.
